name: Mr. Abstract
description:
This is an unfinished prototype.  I do not plan on continuing this project.

Mr. Abstract

You play as character made out of triangles.  In fact, everything is made of triangles.  Jump from triangle to triangle in order to complete the level.  But be careful, some of the triangles may try to trick you.  If you go too slow, you may lose sight of yourself.  

This game currently has 7 levels and a large interactable start screen

WASD controls

ESC to return to menu
